hdr-185006.def: Rain-fed cropland, irrigated cropland, or range, pasture, forest and woodlands that have experienced the reduction or loss of biological or economic productivity and complexity resulting from a combination of pressures, including land use and management practices, expressed as a percentage of total land area.
hdr-185006.name: Degraded land
hdr-185006.source: United Nations Statistics Division (2020a). Global SDG Indicators Database. https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/indicators/database/. Accessed 21 July 2020.
hdr-185006.dataset: United Nations Statistics Division (2020a). Global SDG Indicators Database. https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/indicators/database/. Accessed 21 July 2020.
